scripts.deploy:base: cd contracts && CUBIXLES_CHAIN_ID=8453 forge script script/DeployCubixles.s.sol --rpc-url "$BASE_RPC_URL" --private-key "$BASE_DEPLOYER_KEY" --broadcast
scripts.deploy:base:dry: cd contracts && CUBIXLES_CHAIN_ID=8453 forge script script/DeployCubixles.s.sol --rpc-url "$BASE_RPC_URL" --private-key "$BASE_DEPLOYER_KEY"
scripts.deploy:mainnet: cd contracts && CUBIXLES_CHAIN_ID=1 forge script script/DeployCubixles.s.sol --rpc-url "$MAINNET_RPC_URL" --private-key "$MAINNET_DEPLOYER_KEY" --broadcast
scripts.deploy:mainnet:dry: cd contracts && CUBIXLES_CHAIN_ID=1 forge script script/DeployCubixles.s.sol --rpc-url "$MAINNET_RPC_URL" --private-key "$MAINNET_DEPLOYER_KEY"
